name: Donald's Snow Fight
overview: Donald's Snow Fight is a game for the C64 that is inspired by the 1942 Disney short cartoon of the same name. It was developed by retrogamer1975 and released to the public domain in 2020. Story: Donald needs a bouquet of roses for his date with Daisy. His nephews have seven red roses but won't give it to him. They have hidden them in their seven snow castles and to get them Donald needs to beat them in snowball fighting.
